Short Biography:

Hello, my name is Mason and I was born in Fargo, ND but I grew up in Barnesville, MN. I moved to the Fargo-Moorhead area when I was 4. Living here is not necessarily the most exciting thing ever, however I have been able to travel to various places like Mexico, Italy and Hawai'i throughout my life. My career aspiration is unknown at the moment as I don't really have a clear idea as to what I want to do quite yet.

Unique Skills:

Learning new topics, Social awareness, Likes being cold (weird), Inadvertently being funny, More motivated/productive while listening to music.

Weekly Schedule

Throughout the week i dont have much going on, but I try to go to the gym in the evenings after work. I also use Tuesdays and Thursdays to do chores and around the house work. This schedule works for me because I have certain days to work and others to do homework and that allows me to be able to focus more and be more productive.
